definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞的“付費圍牆”跟隨他走四方。

sentences.english: Two bags of cement were parked behind the fence.
sentences.chinese: 兩袋水泥放在圍牆後面。

sentences.english: He went outside the walls, sat under a shady plant and sulked.
sentences.chinese: 他走到圍牆外面，站在一棵蔭涼的植物下生氣。

sentences.english: I strongly believe that the most horrible prison has no ruthless walls and windows.
sentences.chinese: 我確實相信，世界上最恐怖的監獄並沒有鐵窗和圍牆。

sentences.english: The foal balked at the high stone fence.
sentences.chinese: 在高高的石圍牆面前小馬駒停步不前。

sentences.english: Sometimes I stand on tiptoe to look over tall fences.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我踮起腳眺過高高的圍牆。

sentences.english: Rough- hewn , angular notes, like stones in the wall of a churchyard.
sentences.chinese: 粗獷，生硬的音符，像墓地圍牆上的石頭般。

sentences.english: The outdoor arena is a plane surface surrounded by walls with three levels of balconies on each side.
sentences.chinese: 室外的領域是平面的圍牆包圍三個層次的陽臺，每邊。

sentences.english: The north tower butts against the outer wall.
sentences.chinese: 北邊那座塔緊鄰着外圍牆。

sentences.english: The game was played on vast walled and banked playing areas.
sentences.chinese: 比賽在寬闊有圍牆的比賽場巨型。

sentences.english: A heavy downpour caused the wall of his house to crumble.
sentences.chinese: 一天，一場傾盆大雨沖壞了他家的圍牆。

sentences.english: He put a gate across the opening in the fence.
sentences.chinese: 他在圍牆的開口處安了一個門。

sentences.english: Enemy fire battered the walls of the fort.
sentences.chinese: 敵人炮火轟擊城堡的圍牆。

sentences.english: The exposed concrete ceiling floats 60 centimeters above the peripheral walls using steel columns.
sentences.chinese: 露石混凝土天花板利用鋼柱浮在圍牆上方60釐米。

sentences.english: He made a few dabs at the fence with the paintbrush, but didn't really paint it.
sentences.chinese: 他用漆刷在圍牆上輕輕塗幾下，但並未真正油漆圍牆。

sentences.english: He made a few dabs at the fence with the paintbrush, but didn't really paint it.
sentences.chinese: 他用漆刷在圍牆上輕輕塗幾下，但並未真正油漆圍牆。

definition: building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
